topics.body:
I feel the need to say my mind. Here goes.

I am scared. Really thinking about my relationship. I fear that if it were to end, things won't ever be the same again. She was always there, someone I could count on. Then all this happened, and I couldn't say no. Doing so would only drive her away. I had no choice. Now, I feel like I already have fallen for her. But I'm scared that if something happens, I might never get her back. 

Right now, seeing her smile just be herself, I feel a sense of security. As is nothing bad will happen. But there's always that bad ending, that probability. I just can't let that happen. I won't let it.

Sorry, just something I needed to get of my chest.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

*MISSOURI WHAT THE FLYING FUCK IS WRONG WITH YOUR POLICE?!*

You heard that right; a police officer mere miles away from Ferguson shot to death a african american teenager *BECAUSE THE TEEN HAD A SANDWICH IN HIS HANDS!*

Just god damn it.[/bq]

MÃ©xico. 43 students. One got killed by a police officer. The others were taken by them, and then nobody know nothing more about the students. Three days later, almost half of the students were found death in a hole in the middle of nowhere. People claims that the police give them to the sicarios to do what you know what they always do. 

Yeah, the police sucks this days...
